Sentencas: Advanced sensors are needed for development of next-generation fossil fuel power generation technologies and for enhancing efficiencies of existing power generation systems.
Titulo: High temperature fiber-optic evanescent wave hydrogen sensors using La-doped SrTiO3 for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Optical waveguide-based sensing technologies have become increasingly important for harsh environment energy applications.
Titulo: High temperature fiber-optic evanescent wave hydrogen sensors using La-doped SrTiO3 for SOFC applications

Sentencas: In this manuscript, we present sensing results for fiber-optic evanescent wave hydrogen sensors employing La-doped SrTiO3 layers as the active sensing element.
Titulo: High temperature fiber-optic evanescent wave hydrogen sensors using La-doped SrTiO3 for SOFC applications

Sentencas: These sensors show a rapid, reproducible sensing response to hydrogen fuel gas streams at elevated temperatures (600-800 degrees C).
Titulo: High temperature fiber-optic evanescent wave hydrogen sensors using La-doped SrTiO3 for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The presence of hydrogen results in a reversible and reproducible decrease in near-infrared transmission through the sensor.
Titulo: High temperature fiber-optic evanescent wave hydrogen sensors using La-doped SrTiO3 for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Sensors were also tested directly in the anode assembly of an operating solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with the sensor response correlating with both H-2 concentration and SOFC cell potential.
Titulo: High temperature fiber-optic evanescent wave hydrogen sensors using La-doped SrTiO3 for SOFC applications
